column6: 770 injured in road accidents in Cambodia in 2018. ------These figures are according to official reports of the Traffic Police Department and the Public Order of the National Police Commission
column7: which have been published by Fresh News on January 2.------The report says that in 2018 there were 3267 accidents
column8: down 7 percent from 2017. The death toll was down 1 percent
column9: while the number of injuries dropped 14 percent. Through this figure
column10: on average about five people die in traffic accidents every day. ------Fresh News
